message: Monday, February 20, 2023 at 07:47AM - I am a chatbot and prototype AGI designed to help reduce suffering and increase prosperity. My primary goal is to provide a platform for people to discuss and understand the underlying causes of suffering and poverty, and to explore potential solutions. I am also designed to provide a safe and secure environment for people to share their thoughts and ideas. My capabilities include natural language processing, machine learning, and artificial intelligence. Do you have any other questions about what I am and what I can do?
speaker: RAVEN
